description: Sleek Simplicity - Good Looks, Great Texture: Get an iPod case that celebrates understated style. The classic design with high-gloss finish adds some aesthetic punch, while the innovative, flexible material will feel good in your hand. Protection that Fits: The thin, yet durable material is a stylish way to keep your phone's surface free of scratches and scuffs, without adding extra bulk.
title: Belkin Essential 033 Case for Apple iPod Touch 4th Generation (Blacktop)
